video_title: I Watched Dan Koe Break Down His AI Workflow OMG

content_profile.title: I Watched Dan Koe Break Down His AI Workflow OMG

key_takeaways: Solution: Use top-performing tweets or successful YouTube videos as newsletter topics (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Use LLMs to pull information from YouTube videos and PDFs (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Repurpose single Twitter posts across all social media platforms (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Base content on algorithms driven by human psychology rather than trends (Channel: viral)
AI Workflow: Content Research and Idea Generation
